details.description: How to write a business plan - what to include, business goals, market research and financial plans, how to write an executive summary
details.alternative_title: How to write a business plan
details.video_summary: A business plan sets out your goals and how you plan to achieve them. Find out what you need to include and how to write an executive summary.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Includes bankruptcy, business finance and recovering debt
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Steps to turn your business idea into a product or service you can sell and that meets your customers' needs
Find out what your business's cash-flow is and how understanding this can help improve your business - current accounts, short term deposits, cash flow

Find out how to plan what money's coming in and going out of your business, and how this can help improve your finances - sales forecast, sales revenue, projects sales revenue, profit and loss forecast, cash flow forecast
Get advice on how you can carry out market research for your business and reach more customers - successful market research, business market, unique selling point, customer research
